snippet: The corporate earnings season begins Tuesday and investors are hoping for a better showing than the first quarter, when companies’ bottom lines were hurt by severe winter weather.
abstract: Investors, after pushing stock market to record levels, turn cautious ahead of start of corporate earnings season.
lead_paragraph: The corporate earnings season begins Tuesday and investors are hoping for a better showing than the first quarter, when companies’ bottom lines were hurt by severe winter weather.

headline.main: Earnings Season Anxiety Sends Shares Lower
headline.print_headline: Earnings Season Anxiety Sends Shares Lower
